description: A creamy cheesecake with the added festive flavours of Christmas pudding.
name: Christmas Pudding Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the base by combining the biscuits, crushed hazelnuts and butter.
Transfer this to the base of your cake tin and push down hard and then place the broken pudding pieces on top of that. Put into the fridge while you arrange the rest of ingredients.
In a large pot, melt the chocolate with the cream.
Once melted, add the rest of the ingredients apart from the rocher sweets and once combined fully. empty the contents into the cake tin.
Allow the cake to set in the fridge for up to 4 hours before serving.
